page.title: 14WHEATHAMPSTEAD GAMES & SPORT
page.content:
{Jacks}is a game where you throw them up in the air and get the ones that were on the ground and pick them up and catch the ones that were in the air and add the amount you caught and start again.
{Tag}is a game where you can have hundreds or more people playing. Someone is it and they have to catch the others that are left.You can then start again.Then you can play another game.
{Football}is a game that boys and some girls play.I'm going to tell you how to play football.You have a ball and you have two teams.There 11 boys in a football team.Each team tries to score by kicking the ball into a goal. If you score a goal the team cheers.
